# Assignment 3: Tiny Compiler

## Description

## Complilation Instructions
How to compile the program:

'''bash
# Example for a C/C++ Project
gcc parsercodegen.c -o parsercodegen
'''


## Usage
How to run the compiled program:

'''bash
# Example Usage
./parsercodegen [input_filename] [output_filename].ELF
'''


## Example

'''bash
#Example command and expected output
./parsercodegen input.txt

# Program outputs a the set of instuctions generated by the
# parser and code generator and the symbol table used in the
# syntax analyzer to system out, followed by an Executable
# Linkable File.

#Example Output

Line  OP   L M
0 JMP   0 3
.
.
.

Kind |        Name | Value | Level | Address | Mark
---------------------------------------------------
   1 |           x |     2 |     0 |       0 |    1
   1 |           y |     3 |     0 |       0 |    1
   2 |           a |     0 |     0 |       3 |    1
   2 |           b |     0 |     0 |       4 |    1
   2 |           c |     0 |     0 |       5 |    1

PATH/[output_filename].ELF
